ED_Title: Provisional programme of work and timetable of the First Committee for 2017
ED_DecisionText:
At its 51st plenary meeting, on 5 December 2016, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the First Committee,  approved the provisional programme of work and timetable of the Committee for 2017, as set out in the annex to the report of the Committee. 

(See A/71/458, para. 5; A/71/PV.51)
ED_Disclaimer: The text of this decision is available in all languages in document A/71/49 (Vol. II).
